channel.title: A few questions from a noob :)
channel.description:
yes i am a noob i finally felt like making a server and i have a few questions which are how do i make stats 99 without a ::master command? can i change a name or a item? how can i change a colour of a item? how do people connect to your server without hamachi thing? how do i change what a monster drops and the rate it drops at?
if anyone can answer any of these in asmuch detail as possible im abit of a dumbarse :D

item.title: A few questions from a noob :)
item.dc:creator: @mrpyro3 mrpyro3
item.description:
@mrpyro3 wrote:

To put it online, find a source and client you like(delta is noob friendly). Then go into the source and Client and edit the ip. For the source go into Client.java and search “no-ip” or “localhost”(common ip’s). Change that ip to your no-ip. For the client(delta) go into gui.java and search “serverip =” and change that ip to you no-ip. Then release your client and people are able to log on. If you need help, feel free to add me on msn at: x-x-box@hotmail.com

Read full topic
item.source: A few questions from a noob :)

item.title: A few questions from a noob :)
item.dc:creator: @dan1 dan.
item.description:
@dan1 wrote:

[quote=“mista pnut, post:3, topic:401720”]To change stats open source>characters> then account you want to change levels. Go to [skills] and change the 1s to 99s and the 0s to 15000000. (1s = level, 0s = xp level)

changing name may/may not work, never tried

changing color is like creating a custom, and you need a special program to do so.

to put server online, you need to portforward. (portforward.com) and get a no-ip (no-ip.com)

monster drops and rates are found in source> config> NPCdrops

I’m not a great explainer, hope this helps a little.
Note: This is for any Delta server[/quote]
ive done port forwarding etc so what do i do exactly cause im really not sure what i do lol

Read full topic
item.source: A few questions from a noob :)

item.title: A few questions from a noob :)
item.dc:creator: @mista_pnut mista pnut
item.description:
@mista_pnut wrote:

To change stats open source>characters> then account you want to change levels. Go to [skills] and change the 1s to 99s and the 0s to 15000000. (1s = level, 0s = xp level)

changing name may/may not work, never tried

changing color is like creating a custom, and you need a special program to do so.

to put server online, you need to portforward. (portforward.com) and get a no-ip (no-ip.com)

monster drops and rates are found in source> config> NPCdrops

I’m not a great explainer, hope this helps a little.
Note: This is for any Delta server

Read full topic
